ace-constitution-generation.description: Auto-generated constitution documents from high-confidence coding patterns with confidence thresholds and observation tracking

python-error-handling-patterns.description: Python exception handling best practices and anti-patterns

ace-playbook-system.description: Structured playbook system with ID-based references and markdown specification files

confidence-based-learning.description: Machine learning pattern where confidence scores drive curation, inclusion, and pruning decisions

evidence-based-guidelines.description: Documentation generation based on empirical observation counts rather than assumptions

evolutionary-documentation.description: Living documentation that automatically updates based on pattern confidence evolution

cross-referencing.description: Linking related documentation through structured references (playbooks, specs)

confidence-threshold-gating.description: Use numerical thresholds to control when patterns are included (70%) or removed (30%)

observation-counting.description: Track empirical observation counts to validate pattern confidence over time

machine-generated-with-human-readability.description: Auto-generate documentation while maintaining human-readable structure with explanations and context

metadata-driven-documentation.description: Include metadata (timestamps, observation counts, confidence scores) in generated documentation for transparency

metadata.discovery_method: bottom-up from file paths and descriptions
